thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com | 5 of 259
thread.title: Pedalsmurf, IN

author: Pedalsmurf, IN
title: Pedalsmurf, IN
text: I bought the lettering to put on a bicycle frame that I was repainting. All the lettering arrived as I ordered. I chose the self-weeding option to save money on the total project. They were easy to peel the extra sticker material and used blue painters tape to transfer to the bicycle frame. definitely recommend this option especially if your lettering is too small and complicated. Very high quality and ultra-thin so clear coating the finished frame made them hardly noticeable to the touch.
